org.jerkar
Class JkFileTree

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.JkFileTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<java.io.File>
public final class JkFileTree
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<java.io.File>

Provides a view on files and sub-folders contained in a given directory. A JkFileTree may have some include/exclude filters to include only or exclude some files based on ANT pattern matching.

When speaking about files contained in a JkFileTree, we mean all files contained in its root directory or sub-directories, matching positively the filter defined on it.

include

public JkFileTree include(java.lang.String... antPatterns)
Short hand to andFilter(JkFileFilter) defining an include Ant pattern filter. This will include any file matching at least one of the specified antPatterns.

exclude

public JkFileTree exclude(java.lang.String... antPatterns)
Short hand to andFilter(JkFileFilter) defining an exclude Ant pattern filter. This will exclude any file matching at least one of specified antPatterns.

deleteAll

public JkFileTree deleteAll()
Deletes each and every files in this tree. Files excluded from this tree are not deleted.
